string.text: Prologue: find out what happened
I don't remember anything. I've got a splitting headache… Where am I? What is this place? I need to find out more about the local stalkers.
Prologue: eliminate the zombies
Savage has told me that to keep the peace in the area, the zombies not far away need to be destroyed.
Prologue: loot the zombie corpses
I need to check out what's in the backpacks of the zombies. Something useful might come out of it.
Prologue: read the note
Perhaps the note contains some useful information. I need to read through it.
Prologue: inform Savage of the stash
I found some quite useful info in the note. I need to share it with Savage.
Spatial anomaly: find a way out of the anomaly
I need to find a way out of the anomaly.
Spatial anomaly: find the decoder
I need to find the decoder that was mentioned in Scavenger's PDA.
Spatial anomaly: show the decoder to Savage
I need to speak to Savage about the decoder I've found.
Spatial anomaly: leave the anomaly
It's time to leave the spatial anomaly.
Rough night: go to sleep
Savage has told me that I should go to sleep, and I agree with him; I feel like crap. I hope a bit of rest will sort things out.
Wake-up call: identify the source of the noise
I've been waken up by a loud noise from the outside. It seems that it's coming from a helicopter. I need to investigate it.
Wake-up call: examine the helicopter crash site
The helicopter's been grounded by an aerial anomaly. I need to make my way to the crash site and examine the area.
Wake-up call: save the soldier
There's a soldier at the crash site, but he's dying. He needs help.
Wake-up call: escort the soldier to the base
I've helped out the soldier, who is now able to walk. I should lead him to the base.
Wake-up call: speak to the soldier
The soldier has made it to the base. Now I can talk to him.
Wake-up call: speak to Savage
I've spoken to the soldier. Now I should see Savage.
Search: find Scavenger
I need to find out about the whereabouts of Scavenger, who, according to Savage, disappeared two days ago.
Search: search Scavenger's corpse
The stalker that I found is dead. I need to check out if his corpse is carrying anything of use.
Search: search for information in the PDA
Scavenger's backpack contained a PDA. I need to check out his last notes.
Search: discuss your findings with Savage
Scavenger managed to accomplish a lot of things before his death. This needs to be discussed with Savage.
Old friend: speak to Knucklehead
Knucklehead has sent me a message and wants to speak to me. I need to make my way to him and find out what he wants.
Night hunt: wait until night
The chimera only enters the bunker at night. We need to wait until the sun sets to hunt it down.
Night hunt: speak to Knucklehead
Night has come. Now I can speak to Knucklehead.
Night hunt: follow Knucklehead
I need to follow Knucklehead.
Night hunt: kill the chimera
I need to kill the chimera with Knucklehead's help.
Night hunt: follow Knucklehead back to base
The chimera is dead. We can now return back to base.
Night hunt: speak to Knucklehead
We're back at base. Now I can speak to Knucklehead.
Strong bonds: speak to Markus
Knucklehead has told me that Markus wants to speak to me about something. I need to make my way to him and find out what he wants.
Chain of events: seek out Shell

Markus has asked me to find Shell, who was the previous leader of the group before Savage. He went missing quite some time ago, but a chance remains that he's still alive, considering his equipment was of good quality.
Chain of events: kill Shell
The crying in the underground has stopped. Shell has appeared on the other side, but he's been zombified. I need to take him out before he takes me out.
Chain of events: search Shell's corpse
Shell is dead. Time to check out his possessions.
Chain of events: return to Markus

After I retrieved a keyring from Shell, I woke up in a basement… but what happened couldn't have been a dream, since the trinket is still with me. An old man has reassured me that this isn't a dream, so I better not tell anyone about what happened in the underground.
Dangerous hunt: speak to Snake
Markus asked me to speak to Snake before the hunt.
Dangerous hunt: kill the flesh
The flesh located at the marker need to be taken out.
Dangerous hunt: return to the base and speak to Markus
I need to return to base and speak to Markus.
Speak to Markus
Markus has written to me and says that he wants to talk.
Missing in action: ask Savage where Markus has gone
Markus hasn't showed up at the base. I need to ask Savage about where he's taken off.
Missing in action: wait until Savage finds a signal
I need to wait for a moment until Savage gets a signal.
Missing in action: speak to Savage
I need to speak to Savage.
Missing in action: find Markus
I need to find Markus.
Missing in action: learn about what happened from Markus
I need to find out recent events from Markus.
Hot on the trail: search where Markus' PDA marker was last registered
I need to search around where Markus' PDA was last registered.
Heart-to-heart: speak to Hatchet
Hatchet and his group have showed up in the bubble. I need to find out what the heck they're doing here.
Old grievances: speak to Markus
I need to speak to Markus.
Old grievances: follow Markus
Markus has a plan to free Savage and the rest of the captive mercenaries.
Old grievances: speak to Markus
It looks like we're at the right place. I need to speak to Markus.
Old grievances: take the equipment and return to Markus
Markus has located the key to the control room; now we have ammunition. I need to replenish my ammo and return back to Markus.
Old grievances: turn off the base electricity
I need to turn off the electricity in the base, which will allow a surprise attack on the mercenaries. It's important I remain unnoticed, or else the stealthy route won't work out.
Old grievances: kill the mercenaries
I need to take out the mercenaries in the base.
Old grievances: speak to Screw
The mercs are down. Now I can focus on freeing the captives.
Old grievances: help Markus
I've freed Screw. I should head over to Markus and help him free the rest of the captives.
Old grievances: speak to Savage
Markus has written to me and said that everyone's been set free; however, Hatchet and his group have fled. I need to speak to Savage about this.
Mysteries of the underground: speak to Screw
I need to turn the bunker lights back on. To do that, I need to restart a transformer in the underground, but the door leading there is locked. Savage told me that Screw might be able to get it open.
Mysteries of the underground: follow Screw
I need to follow Screw.
Mysteries of the underground: wait until Screw unlocks the door
I need to wait. Screw's unlocking the door.
Mysteries of the underground: descend into the underground
The door is open. I can now head down into the underground and restart the transformer.
Mysteries of the underground: speak to General Tachenko
I've encountered a group of Dutyers in the underground. I need to speak to their leader.
Mysteries of the underground: restart the transformer
Now I need to restart the transformer in order to restore the electricity in the base.
Mysteries of the underground: return to Savage
There. I've restarted the transformer. I can now return back to Savage.
Survival: return to the base and speak to Savage
I've managed to find some medicine that'll help the infected, although the amount of medicine in general is low. I should tell everything to Savage.
Survival: give the medicine to the infected
I have two ampules of the drug that'll help mitigate the symptoms of the disease. I have to choose who to hand it to, because there's not enough for everyone.
Survival: speak to Savage
I haven't been able to find any extra medicine. I should talk to Savage about it.
Unknown signal: identify the source of the signal
Markus has sent a message about a signal near the barn. I need to investigate it.
Unknown signal: speak to the unknown man
I've come across an old man at the designated area. I should talk to him.
Unknown signal: lead Forester to the base
The old man's name is Forester. He says that he can lead us out of the anomaly. He's asked me to lead him to the base so that he can speak to the rest of the group.
Unknown signal: speak to Savage
I've led Forester to base. I should talk to Savage next.
Weak signal: check the designated area
Savage says that he's picked up another signal. I need to find its source.
Weak signal: speak to the stalker
I should speak to the unknown stalker.
Final message: speak to General Tachenko
General Tachenko has sent me a message. He wants to speak to me.
Final message: try to reach the general once more
I can't quite make it to Tachenko's position; a teleporter has thrown me off course. I need to give it another shot.
Final message: exit the underground
General Tachenko's men are dead, and he is soon to suffer the same fate. He's asked me to leave the underground.
Freedom: speak to Forester
Lesnik has sent me a message. He's waiting for me not far from the bunker. I should meet up with him and speak to him.
Freedom: follow Forester
I need to follow Forester in order to leave the anomaly.
Kill the controller
A controller has showed up at our doorstep. I need to take it out.
Speak to Savage
You must discuss recent events with Savage.
Rounds for Mosquito: find a pack of 7.62x54 ammo
I need to find a pack of 7.62x54 ammunition and bring it to Mosquito.
Rounds for Mosquito: find 3 more packs of 7.62x54 ammo
I need to find 3 more packs of 7.62x54 ammo.
Rounds for Mosquito: find 2 more packs of 7.62x54 ammo
I need to find 2 more packs of 7.62x54 ammo.
Rounds for Mosquito: find 1 more pack of 7.62x54 ammo
I need to find one more pack of 7.62x54 ammo.
Rounds for Mosquito: give the ammunition to Mosquito
I've found the ammo that Mosquito needed. Now I have to give it to him.
SOS: respond to the distress signal
An unknown stalker has signaled for help. I need to make my way to his position ASAP.
SOS: escort Murad to the base
Murad needs an escort to the base.
SOS: inform Savage of the stalker
I've escorted Murad to base. I should tell Savage about him.
SOS: speak to Murad
I need to speak to Murad.
Scavenger's stash: find the stash
Scavenger has been gathering various possessions and hiding them in a stash that I need to find.
Scavenger's stash: inform Savage about the discovered stash
Scavenger's stash is locked. I need to ask Savage for help with unlocking it.
Scavenger's stash: wait until the container is unlocked
Savage has said that he'll hand over the discovered container to Screw, who will attempt to open it.
Scavenger's stash: speak to Screw about the container
Screw has written me that he managed to unlock the container. I need to meet with him and talk about it.
Emergency contact: find two coils of wire and a battery

According to the soldier, the radio transmitter located in the basement is repairable. He needs a battery and two coils of copper wire. If the radio transmitter manages to activate, we may have the chance of sending a request for help beyond the reaches of the anomaly.
Emergency contact: give the copper wiring to the soldier
I've found two coils of copper wire. I should give them to the soldier.
Emergency contact: find a battery
I've found two coils of copper wire and given them to the soldier. Now I have to try to find a battery.
Emergency contact: give the battery to the soldier
I've managed to find a battery. I should give them to the soldier.
Emergency contact: give the battery and wiring to the soldier
I've managed to find a few coils of copper wire and a battery.
Emergency contact: wait until the soldier repairs the transmitter
I've managed to find a few coils of copper wire and a battery. Time to wait while the soldier fixes up the radio transmitter.
Emergency contact: speak to the soldier
The soldier's likely done with his repair. I should go see him.
Nightmare: search the underground

I met… something in one of the basements. It was a spirit. It said to drink a bottle of vodka that was on the table, and so I did. I have no idea where I've ended up. I should get my bearings and explore this place.
Important discussion: speak to General Tachenko
I've received a message from Tachenko. He has something important to discuss with me, and has asked me to see him.
Necessary provisions: find eight articles of food for Tachenko
Tachenko has asked me to find some provisions for his group. I should help him.
Necessary provisions: give the food to Tachenko
I have enough food to bring to Tachenko and his group.
Lost rifle: speak to Bunchuk
Tachenko has said that Bunchuk has lost his rifle and has asked me to find it. I need to ask Bunchuk the approximate location of his weapon.
Lost rifle: find Bunchuk's rifle
Bunchuk has asked me to bring him his rifle, which he lost while trying to escape from a bloodsucker. He has provided me with the approximate location of the weapon.
Lost rifle: give Bunchuk his rifle
I have Bunchuk's Abakan rifle. I should return it to him.
Death wish: find Baldy and inform him about the fate of Spotty
Before dying, Spotty asked me to pass on an artifact to a stalker by the name of Baldy. I should fulfill his request, though I could also keep the artifact to myself.
Death wish: speak to Baldy about the fate of Spotty
I've picked up the Baldy's PDA signal. He seems to be at the Outpost. I should speak to him about the events in the space bubble.
Survival: acquire and cook a piece of meat for Knucklehead

Things are problematic with our supply of edible food; the amount of it left is dangerously low. It's time to find different provisions. Knucklehead has suggested that I embark at once and roast a piece of boar meat for him and myself.
Survival: give the meat to Knucklehead
Dinner's ready. I should give it to Knucklehead.
Survival: speak to Knucklehead
I'm out of provisions. Savage has told me that I should speak to Knucklehead for assistance.
Rare artifact: find a Wrenched artifact for Markus
Markus has asked me to find a Wrenched artifact for him. He informs me that it can be found inside gravitational anomalies.
Rare artifact: give the Wrenched artifact to Markus
I've found a Wrenched artifact. I should give it to Markus.
Generator fuel: find fuel and give it to Sledgehammer

Sledgehammer has told me that our fuel supply for the diesel generator is running low; without the generator, we won't have any light source. He has asked me to search the area and try to find some fuel for the generator.
Generator fuel: give the fuel canister to Sledgehammer
I've managed to find a fuel canister for the generator. I should give it to Sledgehammer.
Generator fuel: give the fuel canister
I should give the fuel canister.
Anomalous plant: speak to Snake
Knucklehead has told me that Snake's been looking for me. I should speak to him and find out what he wants.
Anomalous plant: cover Snake
Snake has little ammo. I need to protect him from any threats while he tries to find some anomalous plants.
Anomalous plant: speak to Snake
We've returned to base. I should speak to Snake.Ì
Finished business: speak to Savage
Savage has told me to see him after I finish my other matters related to provisions and drinking water.
Explore the place where they found me
You need to explore the place where they found me. Perhaps something from my gear is still there.
